p: Although the differences in most color parameters of the muscles were not significant, the tendency in color was similar. Diet appeared to have a significant effect on the redness ( a*) and yellowness ( b*) parameters of the LL muscle, with more intensely red and yellow meat in Group B than in Group P ( P < 0.001 and P < 0.01, respectively). The highest values of saturation index (chroma) were observed in the LL muscle from Group B ( P < 0.001).
